        public CSSControl isControlCSSProperty(java.lang.String prop)
        Determines whether given property is control CSS property or not
        Parameters:
        prop - Given CSS property
        Returns:
        If given CSS property is control one, returns corresponding control rule. Otherwise, returns null.
